# YES, THEY DID IT

CONGRATULATIONS!!

![RMSCS2020-graduates](rmscs2020.jpg) 

On the 19th of November 2020, nine students received their degree of the Research Master Programme Social and Cultural Science. We had a hybrid meeting: graduates and faculty were present in real life, family and friends watched the live stream.  

---  

# **PRESENTATIONS**
